definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: This paper presents a microstroke mechanism driven by electromagnets and its control circuit design.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种电磁铁驱动的微进给机构及其控制电路设计。

sentences.english: It is more compact and effective than the usual E- shaped solenoid stator.
sentences.chinese: 它比常见的E形叠片电磁铁铁芯结构紧凑，性能更好。

sentences.english: Transports the steel and iron material using the electro-magnet the installment named electromagnetism hoist crane.
sentences.chinese: 利用电磁铁来搬运钢铁材料的装置叫做电磁起重机。

sentences.english: One end of the rotation axle is connected with an electromagnet by a pull rod and a weight rod.
sentences.chinese: 转动轴的一端通过拉杆和重锤杆与电磁铁相连。

sentences.english: Making an electromagnet at home is fun and easy.
sentences.chinese: 在家做一块电磁铁是既简单又有趣的。

sentences.english: Drop the coil over the projecting core of the electromagnet, with the current-turned on.
sentences.chinese: 除去以上的电磁铁线圈投影核心，以电流打开。

sentences.english: Electromagnets are very useful in our daily lives.
sentences.chinese: 电磁铁在日常生活中用处非常大。

sentences.english: This current by controlling the electromagnet to control the mechanical movement.
sentences.chinese: 这样通过控制电磁铁的电流就控制了机械运动。
